title: BBEdit for Mac updated with new Shortcuts actions and multiple Notebooks
content:
Popular code and text editor BBEdit was updated on Tuesday with multiple new features. Version 14.1 of the macOS app brings new Shortcuts actions and adds support for multiple Notebooks.

more…

The post BBEdit for Mac updated with new Shortcuts actions and multiple Notebooks appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Popular code and text editor BBEdit was updated with new Shortcuts actions and support for multiple Notebooks.
